entry.title: bottle and parameters
entry.content:
Use request.query to retrieve the url parameters

{% codeblock lang:python %}

coding: utf-8

from bottle import *

@route(‘/’) @route(‘/index.html’) def index():

return '<a href="http://www.ahwkong.com/hello">Go to Hello page</a>'

@route(‘/hello’) def hello():

name = None
names = request.query.getall('name')
if names:
    name = names[0]
return '<h1>Hello %s</h1>' % name

run(host=‘localhost’, port=8000, reloader=True)

{% endcodeblock %}
